parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be officially sanctioned campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "#EchipaValeriuIftime!", strongly suggesting it refers to a candidate named Valeriu Iftime.  This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting data shows a broad geographical reach within Botoșani County and surrounding areas. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "Pe 1 decembrie, votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime! Votăm schimbarea!" ("On December 1st, we vote #ValeriuIftimeTeam! We vote for change!") clearly aims to influence voters to support Valeriu Iftime. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The use of a hashtag further amplifies this intention.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It's a straightforward call to action, not an informative or analytical piece. It does not present different perspectives or facts, but rather promotes a single candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement of a candidate, urging voters to support them.  The call to action is too explicit to be considered a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>420683510976832</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Valeriu Iftime), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective: to encourage voters to support the mentioned candidate. The post's timing, close to the election day, further strengthens this conclusion.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate the clear intent of electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Nenișcă Andrei, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 420683510976832) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Valeriu Iftime prin îndemnul explicit „Pe 1 decembrie, votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime! Votăm schimbarea!”, având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea acestuia. Postarea, fiind o reclamă plătită pe Facebook, vizează o audiență largă, conform datelor din Ad Library, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane.  Lipsa unui număr CMF nu exonerează de răspundere, având în vedere caracterul evident de propagandă electorală al mesajului.  Contactul advertiserului este ionut.voicu.bt@gmail.com și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
